I'm alive. The TevFifty project took most of the
Gladiator energy I had, and as such I haven't been
doing much with the program lately. I was thinking of
throwing together a quick edit of G:BF that actually
runs and has a few playable levels, but that's not
something that's high on my priority list.
   -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
